00010         class MysqlAdapter implements DbAdapter
00011         {
00016                 const NAME = "mysql";
00017 
00022                 static $queries_count = 0;
00023                 
00028                 public $link;
00029                 
00034                 public $query;
00035                 
00040                 public $result;
00041                 
00046                 public function connect()
00047                 {
00048                         if (!is_resource($this->link) || get_resource_type($this->link) != "mysql link")
00049                         {
00050                                 $this->link = mysql_connect(DB_HOST, DB_USER, DB_PASS);
00051                                 mysql_select_db(DB_NAME) or die("Cannot connect: " . mysql_error());
00052                         }
00053                 }
00054                 
00060                 public function select_db($database_name)
00061                 {
00062                         $this->connect();
00063                         return mysql_select_db($database_name, $this->link);
00064                 }
00065                 
00070                 public function close()
00071                 {
00072                         mysql_close($this->link);
00073                 }
00074                 
00080                 public function prepare($query)
00081                 {
00082                         $this->connect();
00083                         
00084                         $args = func_get_args();
00085                         $args_len = func_num_args();
00086                         if ($args_len > 1)
00087                         {
00088                                 for ($i = 1; $i < $args_len; $i++)
00089                                 {
00090                                         $query = str_replace('{' . $i . '}', mysql_real_escape_string($args[$i], $this->link), $query);
00091                                 }
00092                         }
00093                         $this->query = $query;
00094                         
00095                         if (DB_DEBUG)
00096                                 $this->print_query();
00097                 }
00098                 
00103                 public function exec()
00104                 {
00105                         $this->connect();
00106                         $this->result = mysql_query($this->query, $this->link) or die("DB unavailable");//die("Error ({$this->query}): " . mysql_error());
00107                         
00108                         self::$queries_count++;
00109                         
00110                         return  $this->result;
00111                 }
00112                 
00117                 public function insert_id()
00118                 {
00119                         return mysql_insert_id($this->link);
00120                 }
00121                 
00127                 public function escape($value)
00128                 {
00129                         $this->connect();
00130                         return mysql_real_escape_string($value, $this->link);
00131                 }
00132                 
00133                 
00140                 public function result($pos = 0, $colname = NULL)
00141                 {
00142                         return mysql_result($this->result, $pos, $colname);
00143                 }
00144                 
00149                 public function num_rows()
00150                 {
00151                         return mysql_num_rows($this->result);
00152                 }
00153                 
00158                 public function affected_rows()
00159                 {
00160                         return mysql_affected_rows($this->result);
00161                 }
00162                 
00167                 public function fetch_assoc()
00168                 {
00169                         return mysql_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00170                 }
00171                 
00176                 public function free_result()
00177                 {
00178                         mysql_free_result($this->result);
00179                 }
00180                 
00185                 public function print_query()
00186                 {
00187                         echo <<<EOT
00188                         <pre class="db-debug">{$this->query}</pre>
00189 EOT;
00190                 }
